name: Hex Puzzle Legend
description:
This puzzle blocks game bring to you hexablock with various shapes and great sound music. If you want a addicted legend game, you found it! Move The mega blocks to fill up the square and collect block pieces to level up!

Features:
- Another type of classic block game
- Smooth effect for block puzzle game
- Play easily and quickly.
- Easy to learn hard to be master hexagon
- NO TIME LIMIT
